snippet: An air-conditioned data center at Sandia National Laboratories in Livermore, Calif., has 500 inexpensive desktop computers lined up on racks that are running a special software simulation intended to mimic the behavior of an entire city's worth of...
abstract: An air-conditioned data center at Sandia National Laboratories in Livermore, Calif., has 500 inexpensive desktop computers lined up on racks that are running a special software simulation intended to mimic the behavior of an entire city's worth of Android smartphones.

headline.print_headline: Simulating a City Of Android Phones
